item.title: 04 Mar 2021 00:00
item.description:
A fascinating talk by Jonah Edwards to the Internet Archive staff. They manage ~200PB of data in-house!

https://archive.org/download/jonah-edwards-presentation/jonah-edwards-presentation_720p.mp4
item.content:encoded:
A fascinating talk by Jonah Edwards to the Internet Archive staff. They manage ~200PB of data in-house!

https://archive.org/download/jonah-edwards-presentation/jonah-edwards-presentation_720p.mp4

item.title: 04 Mar 2021 00:00
item.description: Another brilliant piece from Nate DiMeo. Close to 70 years now and sadly there’s still so much to fight for to get to a level field!
item.content:encoded: Another brilliant piece from Nate DiMeo. Close to 70 years now and sadly there’s still so much to fight for to get to a level field!
